inn1.comm: he begins with one that starts from too far outside off, and it keeps going away. Called a wide.
that's the line. Shafiul angles it in briskly and gets it to swing away from outside off. Taylor doesn't fiddle with it.

and he already has Taylor flashing away outside off. He's not been in good touch in this series, and the flat-footedness at the crease has been one of his problems. On display again, as he throws the hands at an away seamer without moving across.
better from Taylor, watches the movement closely and shoulders arms.
nice stuff from Shafiul, he's testing Taylor in the zone, drawing him into drives early. This one is squeezed off the outside half towards point.
holds the length back a touch and gets it to straighten once again. Taylor leaves.
good start from Shafiul barring the wide, keeps another one outside off and gets Taylor to defend cautiously.
Vusi is away! Slams a short ball in front of square with an emphatic pull. Too short from Rubel, at his pace he can't afford that. Sibanda latches on without a fuss.
much better line, gets Sibanda to angle nervously from the crease as he nips one away from a foot or so outside off.
Sibanda gets behind this one and punches it confidently to mid-off. He is in good form, and it shows.
lets this one go, back of a length outside off. A 'don't mess with me' delivery.
Rubel is all over the shop, and Sibanda is stealing runs here. A full toss on the pads, it comes with a ribbon on it, and Sibanda crunches it through midwicket for four more.
finishes with a length ball straightening from middle stump. Sibanda defends.
Taylor pushes outside to cover the line - good signs for him - and defends a length ball.

stunner from Taylor. Shafiul again pitches it up, looking for the away movement, but gets a little carried away and drops this on middle and leg in search of the dream legcutter. Taylor again gets nicely forward and meets the ball with the full face to send it packing straight down the ground for four.
attacks the stumps again, Taylor works it off the inner half towards square leg.
Taylor stands tall on the crease and punches a short of length ball towards point.
over-pitched on off stump, Sibanda strokes it into the covers with a half movement forward.
better length, it's not quite there for the drive. Taylor blocks it down the track.
Rubel's natural length, as always, is much shorter than Shafiul's. Sibanda hangs back in the crease and forces it towards mid-off.
even shorter and angling in, cramping Sibanda for room completely. He defends off the back foot again.
this time he angles too far down and Sibanda nudges it through square leg for a single.
on the pads again, easy pickings for Taylor who whips through square leg. The ball slows up in the outfield and they pick up three.
rousing stroke, Sibanda cracks a square punch on the up but point is in the way.
Sibanda is compact as he gets behind the line and defends down the track.
Shafiul continues wide of off stump, Taylor lets it go.
short cover is in business as Taylor punches a short ball straight at him.
Shafiul drifts onto the pads inevitably, and Taylor works him to fine leg for a single.
short and wide outside off, Sibanda shoulders arms.
fuller outside off, Sibanda doesn't have a go at it.
even closer to off stump, but Sibanda resists again. Nice confident start this for Zim.
Taylor chips out of the crease immediately and eases him with the turn through extra cover for one.
short to Sibanda and the ball doesn't come on. He mistimes the cut to cover.
good line, curves in towards middle and leg and then straightens. Sibanda defends.
good old Mushfiq howls in agony as Sibanda misses a cut and the ball skids into the keeping gloves.
and now Mushfiqur roars out an appeal for lbw. The ball doesn't straighten enough as it raps the pads. Surely going down the leg side.
ah, too wide. Sibanda knows it's not turning much, but there was enough room for him in any case to unfurl the cut. Nicely placed, behind point and it purrs away for four.
Shafiul plugs away, getting it to go away off a length. Taylor leaves.
Taylor moves into line and punches this time, straight to mid-off.
Taylor defends from the crease after getting across to off stump.
enough width this time for Taylor to open the face and steer it backward of point for one.

Sibanda takes him on! A touch of Inzamam in the way he executed that shot. It was a length ball, it wasn't doing much and it was at a friendly pace, but the manner in which Sibanda lined it up was emphatic. He moved across, leaned out, went down on a bent knee as he drilled it over the top, a couple of bounces through long-off.
recedes into the crease this time, and defends a length ball down the track.
Taylor carefully covers the line as Razzak looks to turn it across from middle and leg. Defended into the leg side.
Taylor is in the crease again as he defends down the track.
shorter and wider, but not enough for the cut. Taylor guides into the covers.
Taylor jumps out to the flight and gets the pad in the way as Razzak turns one away.
he nudges this off the pad through backward square leg for a single.

uppish but safe. This one stops on Taylor as it angles in towards the pads and he whips it uppishly, perilously close to an acrobatically diving fielder at midwicket. It beats him and goes away for four.
fuller length on off stump, Taylor drives into the covers.
crack-a-boom! Too much width for a batsman of Taylor's pedigree to let go, he flays the leather off it with a thundering upper cut.
Shafiul wisely cuts the width and Taylor works it to the leg side for a single.

Sibanda goes! By itself, he played a lovely shot there, going down on a knee and square-driving with style. Unfortunately, Shafiul got this to deviate just enough to kiss the outside edge and fly to the right of Mushfiqur who tumbles away and takes it. Muted celebrations from Bangladesh as Vusi walks off.
he lets the first ball go, flourishing into position before leaving an away seamer.
skips out and eases Razzak with the turn to the off side.
ah, don't bowl on his pads ... Taylor drops down on a knee and efficiently rolls the wrists over the sweep.
fuller on off and middle, good attacking line. Taylor defends.
this time Taylor eases it into the covers for a single.
back of a length outside off, Masakadza defends.
full and tight on off stump, Taylor shuffles across and defends.
Taylor walks across again and then plays around the front pad as Shafiul angles a full ball in. Inside edged onto the pad.

whoa, imperious timing from Taylor. This was not over-pitched by any stretch of imagination. Taylor leans well forward from his stance and pushes it down the ground. The ball, verily whizzes to the boundary.
holds the length back, Taylor deals with it respectfully.
on the pads and whipped through square leg to bring up Zim's 50.
tempts him with a length ball going away from outside off. Hamilton doesn't play at it.
tossed up on off, Taylor smothers and blocks.
holds it back, forces Taylor to press back and push into the covers.
landed on leg and straightening, Taylor works it to the leg side.
uppish but safe. Razzak gets Taylor to push at a slow, stopping loopy ball outside off, and it lands just short of Razzak as he dives to his left.
Taylor keeps it down this time, and gets a single into the covers.
Masakadza stays in the crease and defends with a straight bat.
and immediately induces a top edge! Taylor looks to sweep a full ball and ends up lobbing it back just over the keeper's head. Lucky.
deals with a straight bat this time and guides Mahmud to the leg side.
this time Mahmudullah turns it too much, past Taylor's sweep and it is called a wide.
finally Taylor gets the sweep away, guiding him with the turn to fine leg.
Hamilton is still on 0. He jumps out and looks to drive straight, but Mahmudullah gets in the way.

what a strange dismissal! Masakadza is gone for a duck. Easily the worst ball of the over. It was short, it angled in towards leg stump and then turned further away. Masakadza could have easily let it go. But he chose to attempt a paddle-pull-sweep of sorts. He went really hard at it, even as Mushfiqur quickly moved to his left to cover the line. Did he nick it? Must have been a feather at best. Mushfiqur went up in a huge appeal as soon as he caught it. His vocal chords were in trouble by the time the umpire Chirombe decided to give it out.
Taibu carefully defends his first ball to the leg side.
on the pads from Razzak, Taylor glances fine without timing.
loopy ball outside off, Taylor chips it in the air, almost straight to short cover.
Taylor gets the single into the covers this time.
Taibu covers the line and defends from the crease.
slips down the leg side and called wide.
on the pads, Taibu presses forward and works it to the leg side.
flighted outside off, Taylor drives to wide mid-off.
driven with the spin to long-on for a single.
width outside off for Taibu who stands tall (yeah, speaking relatively here) and drives into the covers for a pleasing looking three runs.
tossed up and breaking in, driven down the track.
this one is floated outside off, Taylor moves into line and plays it to mid-off again.
on the pads, Taylor clips to midwicket to end the over. The spinners and settling in nicely.
appeal for lbw but Taibu is saved by the inside edge onto the pad as Razzak fires in the armer.
gets the full face behind this one and defends down the track.
Taibu skips out and drives with the turn, Razzak moves to his left to stop it.
Taibu jumps on the first bad ball he gets this over, it was short and wide, and despite the two men waiting square of the wicket on the off side, he placed the cut well enough for four.
fuller length, Taibu stays in the crease and blocks.
drifting in to middle and leg, Taibu works it to the leg side.
Taylor looks to advance, but sees he not to the pitch and defends.
speared into the pads with enough pace for Taylor to harness with a neat little paddle that runs down to deep backward square leg for a couple.
shortens the length and gets this one to break into Taylor who works it to square leg.
that was tossed up and looped in towards middle and leg before turning down the leg. Taibu got a tickle in along the way.
Taylor is looking good here, drives Mahmudullah into the mid-on area for a single.
Taibu looks to manufacture room, but gets cramped as it turns in, and he defends to the off side.
tossed up on off and turning sharply as Taylor advances and then eases it with the spin to the leg side.
that surely slipped out! Shakib tosses it up miles into the air and wide, it is too wide for Taibu to play a proper shot and he mistimes it to backward point.
gets this one to land. Taibu defends.

suicide! Taibu is gone at the stroke of drinks, lurching up and down the track like a man already very drunk. Short ball outside off, Taibu cuts it to the left of Nasir at cover and bounds out like an energiser bunny. Taylor wasn't fully sold on the idea, Taibu hesitated, then started again and was near the middle of the pitch by the time Nasir had the ball after diving away, and lined up a throw to Mushfiqur. Taibu eventually tried to get back in, but it was too late.
speared in on middle and leg, Mutizwa defends to the leg side.
another one of those slipping wide deliveries. Mutizwa lets it go.
lazy from the fielder at backward point. Mutizwa is away with a ginger steer that the fielder allows through and they pick up a couple by the time he can retrieve it.
short ball turning down the leg side, Taylor guides a pull for one.
Mutizwa moves across to the off stump and works with the turn to square leg for one.
Taylor works him with soft hands through square leg and is alert to return for the second.
one again, Taylor gets the front pad across and eases a single through midwicket
hint of drift from Mahmudullah, this breaks in and finishes on the pads as Mutizza looks to glide to fine leg.
aha, similar ball to the one Masakadza 'edged'. Mutizwa attempts the pull and misses, and it is rightly called wide.
tossed up outside off, Mutizwa drives against the turn towards mid-off.
flighted outside off and firmly driven through the covers for one.
Mutizwa gets too close to the pitch and ends up yorking himself and dead-batting it.
he advances again, gets to the flight and drives into the covers.
back of a length, it stops and turns away from Taylor who forces it to the leg side.
too short, Taylor hurries back and pulls wide of deep backward square leg for a couple.
slow and loopy outside off, Taylor cover drives firmly but finds the fielder.
on the pads, Mutizwa plays it to the leg side.
shorter but sharper in turn as it comes in to cramp Mutizwa's attempter backfoot steer through point.
flighted on off stump, he presses forward to defend into the covers.
Mutizwa finally gets the single, driving solidly to long-off.
turns in towards the pads, Taylor nudges another single to get closer to 50.
tossed up by Shakib outside off, Taylor drives with the turn into the covers. He's bowling slower and slower with every passing over.
again, thrown up deliciously outside off and Mutizwa square drives straight to point.

he was trying something there. Shakib bangs this in short. Was that an attempted bouncer? It sat up like a lollypop on Halloween night and Mutizwa muttered trick or treat before blasting it through midwicket.

Shakib has been bowling all sorts of things today, every other ball is a variation! This was the classic left-armer's dismissal, a slow drifting left-arm spinner than curled in towards off stump before landing short of a length and breaking away. Mutizwa was sucked into the drive and got a feather through to Mushfiqur who again takes it and yells in joy.
flighted outside off, defended off the front foot into the off side.
defends a tossed up ball into the off side.
Taylor brings up 50 with a solid punch down to long-on as Mahmudullah flights it on off stump.
fired in a little faster, Elton covers the line and defends.
faster still, Elton stays on the crease and works it to the leg side.
tossed up outside off, Elton skips out and drives a single into the covers.
Taylor glances a single as the ball turns in towards leg stump. They are forced to hurry through as it goes straight to the fielder.
Elton gets behind the line and defends down the track to end the over.
tossed up outside off, Taylor tries to skip out and get to the flight and defends into the off side.
works a length ball to the leg side and picks up the single this time.
Elton nudges one off the pads through backward square leg for a single.
slow and flighted well outside off, Taylor mistimes the cover drive.
this one angles into the pads, Taylor nudges through square leg and gets the single.
Taylor drives a flighted ball down to long-on for one.
Elton works one off the pads to the leg side.
he gets the single this time, worked through the leg side for a single.
Taylor works one to the leg side, but can't get the single away.
Taylor works one with the turn to the leg side to end the over.
full and searching, not his usual length. Elton defends from the crease as it tails in.
whoa, what happened there? Short of a length outside off, Elton looks to cut even as he is cramped and it runs off the outside edge past Rahim's dive.
Rubel continues to get a touch of inward movement. Taylor defends from the crease as he covers for the deviation.
width from Rubel, and Taylor uses it to pick up a rare boundary. Seems like it has been ages since the last one. It was short, he stood tall, stayed beside the line and freed his arms. Superb cut.
and he gets the single now, stays in the crease and works one down the ground.
tossed up outside off, pushes into the covers for a single
flighted on middle stump, Elton skips out to the flight and drives a single through mid-on.
tossed up outside off, Taylor is too close to the pitch as he looks to play it to the leg side but gets the single.
too short, Elton rocks back and thumps it through point. He plays the shot with a touch of disdain, and Mahmudullah will want to correct the length immediately.
better length, still not full enough though. Elton forces it into the covers.
tossed well up, Elton drives it through the covers for a single.
short of a length from Rubel, Elton hangs back and defends into the off side.
short and wide, Elton muscles it away with a fierce cut but finds point.
short of a length again, but angles in towards Elton who defends down the track.
slower ball on the pads, Elton works it off the pads through backward square leg.
width outside off, Taylor tries to stay beside the line and guide it into the covers.
another slow offcutter, Taylor defends from the crease.
slowly looped up outside off, it is guided towards point.
on the middle and leg line, Taylor works it straight to mid-on.
gets the single this time, worked through the leg side.
slides this one down the leg side, Elton nudges a single through the square leg area.
Taylor advances to a tossed up ball and chips it on purpose in the air down to long-on for a single.
on the pads, Taylor busily nudges another single through square leg.
ah, Rubel bangs it in short and extracts some lift from the track. The batsman weaves away and it is called.
back of a length outside off, Elton steers it point.
Elton stands tall atop the bounce and guides a single through backward point.
similar ball, but it is faster and forces Taylor to guide the cut behind point.
soft hands from Elton, he taps it gingerly into the covers and they hare back for second.
flighted on middle and leg, Taylor takes it on the full and plays it to the leg side.
on the pads again, and he sweeps through square leg for one.
Elton drives with the turn through mid-off for another single.
gets too close to the pitch and drives into the mid-off area.
gets the single this time, drives it through the covers for one.
Elton cuts from the stumps, seems dangerous from here as Shakib gets this to hurtle in with the arm, but Elton gets the single.
tossed up on off, played to the leg side of the pitch.
slow, steady and well pitched up. Elton drives it back to the bowler.
he gets the single this time, driven down the track for one.
Taylor looks to lap him to the leg side with the turn but can't get the single away.
Taylor shuffles across but is caught in no man's land as the ball spins in sharply.
he skips out and looks to work it to the leg side from outside off, but it hits the pad and goes to the off side.
short of a length from Shakib again and it comes in with the angle. Elton forces into the covers for one.
more air to Taylor who drives it to the off side.
back of a length and curving in, Taylor drives against the spin into the covers.
he gets the single this time, using the wrists to guide it through extra cover.
generous flight, easily square driven to the sweeper for a single.
darts this one in on middle and leg, Taylor sweeps on the full through backward square leg.
tossed up on off and breaking in, worked with the turn through midwicket.
this time he gets the single, working it to the leg side.
Elton stays back and punches towards mid-on.
deflects off the pads through square leg for a single.
what's with these Bangladesh spinners attempting bouncers? Another rank longhop, Taylor clatters it away through square leg for four.
fuller, Taylor leans out and sweeps in the same region form runs. Good over this for Zim.
floater fired in outside off, Elton gropes inside the line.
again, not much turn as he probes away outside off.
Elton gets the single down the ground thus time.,
Taylor punches a single with the turn through mid-on.
Elton stays on the crease and forces a length ball to the leg side. Nasir moves across to stop it.
and again, end of a tight over from the offie.
back of a length on middle and leg, quietly worked off the pads to square leg
ah, here comes a dlightful Taylor specialty. He stays on the crease, goes down on a knee to a short ball and opens the face to angle the ball uppishly to third man.
Elton defends into the covers as Rubel plugs away back of a length.
effort ball, takes off from short of a length and Elton weaves away.
another one. Rubel is bowling with some spirit here and getting some lift. Elton hangs in the crease and watches it closely.
this Nasir is electric ain't he. Short again, Elton plays the cut this time to the left of Nasir who dives away and saves some runs.
fired in on middle and off, Taylor chips out and flicks through midwicket.
Elton now, charges out and drives straight to mid-on.
stays back to a short ball turning in and guides it into the covers.

shot of the day from Taylor, brings up the first six of the day. He bounds out of the crease again, doesn't quite reach the flight of this back of a length dart, but just goes through with a powerful flat jab over long on, and it clears the rope despite not going too high.
stays in the crease this time and guides him to long-on for one more.
Elton defends into the off side after reaching out to the flight.
full length ball outside off, Taylor pushes into the covers for one.
Elton can't piece the point area as he angles the bat to steer a full ball into the off side.
shorter outside off, he gets the single this time with a solid backfoot steer.
this goes too far down the leg side, and Taylor nudges it along to fine leg for a single. Would have been a wide if he'd left it.
slower ball goes awry, the legcutter lands too full and very wide of off stump. It's called a wide.
attacks the stumps with a fuller ball now, Elton plays it to the left of Shakib at midwicket who moves in quickly to cut the single.
another legcutter, this time landed on middle and leg, albeit very full. Elton digs it out back to the bowler.
Nasir spears it on off stump and Taylor can't get the single away as he plays it to the leg side.
again, full and flat, it is played back to the bowler.
Taylor works the wrists and picks up a single through square leg.
short and straight this time, Elton whips through square leg and gets aother single away.
enough room outside off for Taylor to rock back and guide a single into the covers.
flat and straight on off stump to end the over, Elton works it straight to midwicket.
lands the first one well outside off, Taylor looks to whip with the turn and gets the single away.
floater outside off, Elton misses the cut and Mushfiqur chirps away ...
tight line, turning into Elton who is getting stuck there. Played straight to midwicket.
gets the single with an angled face, he steers one through cover point.
Mahmudullah fires this short and down the leg side even as Taylor shuffles across, and he pulls it down to deep backward square leg for two.
flighted on off, Taylor forces another single to long-on as Zimbabwe go to drinks at 162/4 with 10 to go. 240 surely on the cards here.
and he angles the first one too far down the leg side. Wide called.
attacks the stumps and gets one to straighten onto the stumps. Taylor looks to defend from the crease.
worked off the pads to short fine leg.
clipped off the pads through square leg for a single.
tossed up on the stumps, Elton defends.
gets some width and powers the cut away to sweeper cover for one.
fired down the leg side, Taylor helps it along to square leg for a single.
full pitched ball outside off, Taylor drives straight to cover.
on the pads and Taylor helps it along to a clumsy fine-leg fielder who fumbles and allows the second.
angling into the pads again, Taylor gets the single away to move to 99.
shoddy, shoddy lines these. Straying again down the leg side, Elton happily helps it on its way past Rahim for four more. His first four, this.
he goes up and over the cover-point area now and gets a single.
Taylor will have to wait for the 100, gets a tight good length ball on off stump from Shafiul and defends.
tossed up on off, Elton punches a single down the ground and hands it to its captain in 99 ...
fired on the pads, Taylor turns it to short backward square leg. The wait continues.
the captain is back! Taylor brings up a rather impressive century in difficult circumstances. Flighted on the pads and swept past backward square leg.
skips out and nudges another single through mid-on.
lovely armer from Razzak, but the good balls haven't come often enough. Elton inner edges it past the stumps for a single.
Taylor reaches out and works a ball from the pads through square leg for one more.
beautiful batting from Taylor. Mid-on is inside the circle, so Taylor picks his spot. He makes a touch of room and launches a length ball over mid-on's head for a smooth couple.
short ball, angling in towards the pads, Taylor taps the pull through backward square leg.

Elton's stay ends. He's sleep-walked through this innings. That's the first real shot of intent he's played today, and he's holed out. Short ball angling in, it was there to be carted away, and he took on the man at deep midwicket. He could not clear him though, and Nasir, as we all know, is a really good fielder.
tries to pull, but is late on the shot and it spurts to mid-on.
another bouncer, Taylor quietly ducks out of the way.

The Batting Powerplay strikes twice! Taylor is gone now, and that's a huge wicket for Bangladesh. Full from Rubel, but angling in towards middle and leg. So unlike the first ball of the over, when he went over mid-on, he was forced to go over the leg side. He ends up holing out to long-on running forward and to his right to take a really good low, tumbling catch inches from the ground.
this one swings in late towards the pads and Waller is away with a squeezed single through backward square leg.
back of a length outside off, Waller plays it into the off side.
poor bowling from Shafiul, strays onto the pads even as Waller moves towards off stump and flicks easily through square leg.
wallop from Waller! Shafiul is shuffling the lengths around, now a short ball, and Waller tucks in for bed and breakfast. Murderous pull sets the ball sailing into the stands at midwicket.
better line and length. Full and on off stump, Waller plays it into the off side.
gets struck on the thigh pad as Waller looks to drive a ball that's not quite full.
back of a length outside off, Waller check drives into the covers.
back of a length outside off, it is a slower ball that comes through late and Waller misses the dab to third man.

Waller is out hit wicket! Today's been a day for strange dismissals, and here's the strangest of them all. It was the surprise effort bouncer from Rubel, Waller was clearly late in spotting it and played an ungainly late pull, that was more of a waft in front of his face even as he went back in the crease. He ended up hitting the stumps with the bat as he played that pull ...
a yorker to begin proceedings, full and fierce on off stump, Price digs it out.

implosion central at Bulawayo. The umpires are having another look, but Price might be on the way here. Short of a length outside off, it holds its line, doesn't do much off the strip as Price pokes at it from the crease. Thick outside edge taken, and Mushfiqur does extremely well to dive away and pluck it as he tumbles. Not sure what the umpires were checking for there. Straightforward dismissal that.
yorker again, Jarvis does well to play it into the leg side.
good delivery to end the over, tailing in and attacking the stumps. Jarvis gets behind the line and defends.
angled in towards the pads, Utseya plays it to the leg side meekly.
pacy yorker outside off, Utseya can't quite dig it out.

Utseya doesn't prosper! Zim have lost five wickets in the last ten minutes or so. What an ugly heave across the line too. Shafiul kept it straight and on a length, hoping that Utseya would miss it and the batsman obliges with a blind slog that middles the air, and nothing else. Nine down.
on Mpofu's pads with the angle and he nudges gingerly through square leg for one.
on Jarvis' pads and he picks up a leg bye as he misses the drop to the leg side.
Mpofu is solidly behind a length ball and defends it into the off side.
fierce appeal for caught behind, but turned down. Rubel gets this to swerve in sharply even as Jarvis gropes off the back foot. He seemed to be playing inside the line.
another one that tails in sharply, Jarvis gets it into the off side with no timing.
late inswing once more, Jarvis has no clue about it as he flays from the crease. Inside edged through fine leg.
Mpofu stays behind the line and plays into the covers.
ripper of a bouncer, that did everything except kiss the outside edge as Mpofu moped at it from the crease.
and another one comes in late, Mpofu inside edges it onto the pads. Rubel bowls an entire over without picking up a single wicket. Must be finding the experience strange.
armer outside off, Jarvis defends from the crease into the off side.

all over. That's the end of Zimbabwe's innings, and they have capsized from a potential 250 total to 199. Nothing stroke from Jarvis, looks to make room and cart Razzak over the covers. He misses, Razzak hits.

inn2.comm: horror ball, bangs it in his own half and it goes like a blimp well over the batsman's head.
this is poor from Mpofu, another wide this time down the leg side from over the stumps.
back of a length on the hips, nudged away through backward square leg. Tamim is away.
similar ball aimed at Kayes' ribs and he fends it off the back foot to the leg side.
fuller and outside off, that's where he wants to be. Kayes lets this go.

stunning effort from Utseya, but he's spilt it! Full and wide outside off, Kayes throws his biceps behind it, on the up. That was flying over the covers, Utseya at cover jumped back and to his right very quickly and got both hands to it, but it popped out as he fell.

Kayes has brought his bazooka out for this. He's thumped a back of length ball a couple of miles behind the long-on boundary. Immense timing, he walks out, gets the short ball in his sights and just blasts it away with a horizontal bat. Ka-boom.
slow offcutter to end an eventful over, Kayes pushes it into the covers.
Tamim joins the fun, clean and flowing cover drive as Jarvis over-pitches outside off. Finds the gap and keeps going.
Crack! Bangladesh reckon this is their day. Short of a length and wide outside off, Tamim scythes it in front of point for four more.
back of a length and on middle and leg this time, Tamim punches it on the up over midwicket and them amble across for three as Waller fumbles.
over-pitched outside off, Tamim inner-edges the cover drive into the leg side.

Kayes is in the farm and he's ploughing away. That's as agricultural as they come. Short ball on middle and leg, he throws his bat at it and the ball scoots through midwicket. Not well timed, but it was probably just scared away by the fierceness of the swing.
better from Kayes, gets behind the line and defends down the track.
Mpofu whangs this in side arm from round the stumps, Kayes looks to nudge it to the leg side off the back foot.
short again and angling in, Tamim pulls it in front of square leg for one.

put your hands together from Jarvis who has produced a moment of Angelo Mathews-esque brilliance at the deep backward point fence. Short and wide, the batsman climbs on it with a rousing upper cut and it goes high and lands just inside the rope. Jarvis scurries across from third man, jumps over the rope and yanks the ball back into play before falling over himself and landing on the advertising boards. He then recovers and thros it back to the keeper.
Kayes cuts powerfully through point for one more.
short again, angling into Tamim who pulls uppishly but safe for a single.
short once again ti end the over, wide outside off too. Cut away through backward point for a single.
good line, angling across from leg to off and keeps the batsman in the crease.
Kayes has a bus to catch. He thunders down the track and swings like an axe murderer at a short and wide ball that was in another zip code.
better from Kayes, straight bat and all that. Pushed into the covers.

he's alternating between sanity and violence every ball. What a corker of a shot that! Short ball from Jarvis, decently pacy too as it angles across but Kayes is on to it really early and thumps it out of the ground. Miles and more over midwicket.

Price drops it at slip. Jarvis lands this on a length outside off, Kayes nurdles at it as it angles across and edges it to the right of Price who is standing wide. He moves to the right quickly, but can't hold on.
well bowled from round the stumps, squares up Kayes as he feels for it outside off.
Bangladesh are flying away with this. Length ball outside off, Kayes drills it imperiously through the covers. Emphatic hitting.
angling in towards Tamim who nudges to the leg side for a single.
banged in short by Mpofu, Kayes actually leaves it. Lucky ball.
back of a length outside off, Kayes defends from the crease towards point.

Kayes was playing Russian roulette, and inevitably he's found the bullet. Back of a length ball outside off, he refuses to let three balls go on the trot and launches on on-the-up drive. He finds cover.
Junaid is away wit a four too, slashing a full and wide ball well outside off over point.,
pokes away as Mpofu keeps it back of a length outside off. Swish and a miss.
now that Kayes has finished his Tamim impersonation, Tamim moves into his own shoes. He opens up the off side and dumps Utseya inside out wide of mid-off for four.
he skips out again, it is a full toss and he tries to hammer the pull shot. Utseya deflects it on his follow through.
single taken this time.
wide now as Utseya loses the line.
Junaid turns the strike over, pushing a single away.
full toss on the pads, Tamim slaps it through the square leg for one.
on the pads again, worked through square leg for one.
short ball outside off, Junaid stands atop the bounce and dabs it through backward point for one.
bouncer banged in ridiculously short, and Tamim does well to wait and guide the pull down to deep backward square leg.
on Tamim's pads, he tries to glance it down the leg side but misses.
slowish length ball outside off, Tamim plays it into the covers.
offcutter to end the over, Tamim mistimes it and Mpofu fields in his follow through.
Junaid takes it to Utseya now, he chips out to the flight and unfurls a lovely lofted off drive that takes off and lands over the long-off ropes. Lovely shot.
Utseya holds it back a touch, and Junaid defends from the crease.
again, better length and Junaid focuses on defence.
short ball, Junaid tries to carve it through the covers but finds the fielder.
tossed up and slower, Junaid leans out to block.
back of a length, forced into the covers to end the over.
short and wide outside off, he goes for a front foot scythe over point and misses.
fuller length, but still too wide outside off. Junaid reaches across and tries to plaster it through the covers. Miss.
short ball angling in, Junaid is onto the pull early and guides it uppishly through midwicket.
offcutter outside off, Tamim spots it as he moves into position and check-drives into the covers.
width outside off, Tamim goes for the cut and gets it down to third man where there is protection.
caught on the crease, fishing outside off. Back of length ball shaping away off the seam, and Junaid has a flat-footed poke.
tossed up on off, Tamim deflects it to the leg side.
flight again, on middle stump line and Junaid defends.
draws him into a drive this time, and Utseya fields on the bounce.
leans out again to work the drive into the covers.

Jarvis takes an absolute blitz of a catch running back from mid on. Junaid jumps out, gets to the flight and looks to send the ball into orbit. He nearly does too, the ball spends an eternity in the air before descending back down in the region of deep midwicket. Jarvis seemed to misjudge it initially as he back-pedalled to his left and behind, and took it overhead as he fell back. Save the replay of this catch on Youtube!
short ball on the pads, Rahim nudges it through square leg for one.
Mpofu's bouncers are taking a hammering. Tamim climbs on to this one and whacks it through midwicket for four.
another short ball, but hopelessly wide. Mpofu has been the definition of shoddy today.
fuller length, gets Tamim forward into a defensive steer into the covers.
back of a length, pushes Tamim into the crease to force it back down the track.
angled into the pads, Tamim gingerly turns it around to midwicket.
angled into the pads once again, this time Tamim gets the single with a nudge through square leg.
flighted on off, Tamim leans into a defensive push.
ah, too short. Tamim cashes in, he presses back into the crease and creams it through the covers.
on the pads and worked to the leg side.
goes for a sweep, but finds the fielder at short fine leg.
Utseya drops another one short, Tamim clatters four more through point.
Mpofu angles one into the pads and Rahim gets it on the pad as he misses the whip.
back of a length and angling in once again, Rahim blocks from the crease.
attacks the stumps again, Rahim plays a bit around the pads and gets it down to fine leg for one.
short of a length from round the stumps, Tamim taps it to a slow-moving Utseya at mid-off and they steal a single.
bouncer at Rahim who happily ducks under it.
full ball, tails in late and hits Rahim's pads as he misses the flick.
Tamim rolls along, he jumps out to the flight and looks to go inside out but gets a thick inner edge that goes through midwicket for four.
Tamim does it right this time, inside out through the covers and fielder in the deep gets into a mess with the spin on the ball.
Tamim has 50! Finally finds a way to make the Zim attack look 'ordinary'. He waltzes down the pitch and heaves Utseya through long on for four more.
Bangladesh have 100. Tamim guides another single through backward point.
Rahim plays from the crease and works Utseya with the spin to the leg side.
back of a length on leg stump, forced back off the back foot.
again short of a length from Price, Tamim plays it down the track.
presses forward to a flighted ball and works it to the leg side.
poor line and length. Short and on leg stump, inviting Tamim to go down on a knee and power the sweep away.
shifts the line outside off now and Tamim guides it into the covers.
Tamim reaches forward to a flighted ball and works it to the leg side.
tossed up on off stump, Rahim plays it to mid-on.
squeezes the single away through backward point off the back foot.
Tamim stays back in the crease and pushes a single past a sloppy mid-off fielder.
Rahim backs away and looks to cut against the turn, but doesn't succeed.
thump. Rahim puts the slog in slog-sweep with a sumptuous heave across the line, launching Utseya with the turn almost all the way over midwicket.
short of a length outside off, Rahim chops it away for one more.
Price round-arms it onto the pads and Rahim defends from the crease.
outside off and straightening, Rahim defends compactly.
ah, he misses out. Fired down the leg side, and Rahim sweeps straight to short fine leg.
speared in on middle and leg, defended towards mid-on.
holds it back a touch, Rahim stays in the crease and defends to the leg side.
tight lines to end the over, Rahim again stays behind the line and defends.
flighted on leg stump, forced through square leg where Chigumbura tumbles and hurts himself.
Rahim nudges with the turn through square leg. Bangladesh are doing this easy here.
tossed up outside leg, Tamim stays inside the line and drives through mid-off.
looped up outside off, Rahim square-drives nicely and gets another single.
short ball, Tamim mistimes the forced pull to mid-off.
better length, draws him forward into defending.
poor ball, dropped short and heading down the leg side. Easily pulled away to deep square leg for one.
short ball on leg stump, Tamim punches down the ground for one more.
Price tosses it up on leg and middle, Rahim defends.
similar line, Rahim defends with exaggerated caution.
works this one off the pads straight to midwicket.
stays behind the line and defends down the track.
fullish ball on off stump, driven into the covers for one.
on the pads, Rahim whips through square leg for one more.
Tamim guides into the covers once more. Bangladesh ticking along nicely.
angling into the pads, worked through midwicket for one.
shortens the length, Tamim hangs back and blocks from the crease into the leg side.
well played, but straight to the fielders. Fuller length outside off, and a sparkling cover drive finds the fielder.
tossed up outside off, Rahim defends into the covers.
on middle and leg this time, Rahim covers the line and defends.
stays back this time and defends down the track.
he tosses it up, Tamim gets to the flight and drives past mid-off for one.

Price has struck with an unending appeal and Tamim is on his way. Not a bad decision by the looks of it from umpire Chirombe. It was speared in from round the stumps, full and on leg stump. Not much turn, it seemed headed for middle and off as Tamim missed the sweep. It took some convincing since Tamim was well forward, but the umpire eventually raised the finger.
Rahim picks up anopther single through the leg side.
Shakib eases into a push into the covers as Jarvis angles it in from round the stumps.
Shakib is away with a thick edge through to third man as Jarvis probes away outside off.
Rahim forces one into the covers without much timing.
stays behind the line this time and defends solidly.
Rahim stays put on the crease and defends again with a straight bat. He's taking his time over this.
slips down the leg side and it is another wide.
lands this outside off, Shakib dabs it to point.
hangs back in the crease and defends to the off side for the pitch.
flighted generously and Shakib drives it hard and back at the stumps. It deflects to mid-off.
Shakib jumps out and drives, but finds mid-off again.
gets this away behind point and has enough time to come back for a second.
short ball, Shakib cuts it straight at point.
full length ball, Rahim punches it to mid-off.
marginally outside off, Rahim dabs it through backward point for a single.
full length outside off, Shakib drives on the up but finds cover.
back of a length and angling in, Shakib nudges through square leg for a single.
Rahim succumbs to the slower ball. He's been compulsively defensive for a while, and seemed to have been sucked into the drive early this time. Straight to cover where Vusi gobbles it.
short ball on middle and leg, Hom pulls it away through backward square leg for one.
tossed up on middle and leg, defended carefully off the front foot.
sliding onto the pads, Hom misses the whip.
short ball, not quite wide but Hom goes for the cut and finds point.
gets the single this time, forcing a drive through the covers off the back foot.
short ball, ooh, Shakib takes a very risky single. He stays back and hits it straight to mid-off before taking off. He had to dive in, and a direct hit might have been trouble.
fired in on the pads, Hom misses the whip.
back of a length outside off, Shakib drives into the covers for one.
full length outside off, driven through the covers for a single. It was hit straight at Sibanda, who hurt his finger. Ouch.
nicely played through point. Shakib stays back and guides the cut through to the deep.
banged in short, Hom is up to the task and pulls it away through backward square leg.
Shakib hangs back and nudges through square leg from the crease.
once again, Shakib taps it with the angle off the pads and gets the single this time.
good running from Hom, Shakib drops a full ball softly into the covers and they scurry across on Hom's insistence.
slides down the leg side, past the attempted pull.
tossed up on off, Hom jumps out and drives into the covers.
hurrying in from back of a length, Hom forces it off the back foot into the covers.
Hom goes big over the leg side. Tossed up on off stump, he clatters a slog sweep through midwicket.
played to deep midwicket for a single to end the over.
Hom is getting closer and closer to hitting a home run. Tossed up by Utseya and he lofts him cleanly over long-off for four.
tossed up again, Hom plays it back to the bowler.
tossed up on off stump, driven through the covers for one more.
drops short, Shakib carves it into the covers. Bangladesh roll along. 49 to win.
hurries him with a quicker one, but Shakib forces it from the crease down the track.
slower and fuller, Shakib is caught neither forward nor back as he plays down the track.
Price keeps him pinned on the crease, Hom defends.
fuller, Hom lashes it over the leg side for a single to the deep.
zombie style fielding. Mutizwa runs back to the covers as Shakib sends the ball hurtling towards the boundary, but misses it as he tries to pull it back. Price is livid.
on the pads, Shakib nudges it through backward square leg for one.
wide down the leg side, and Taibu can't collect cleanly so they get another run. Taibu's injured his fingers in the process too.
tossed up, Shakib dances out of his lair and drives down the ground for one more.
Hom drives another single past the bowler towards mid-off.
offie breaking in, Hom forces it past the bowler for another single.
Shakib guides a single into the covers.
flighted on off stump, Hom leans out to defend
Hom looks to chip it in the air but mistimes it well wide of mid-off running to his right.
full on middle and leg, Shakib digs it out into the covers.
presses forward and drives into the covers to end the over.
up and over past the slips. Mpofu has been short all day, Shakib goes for the  cut and heaves it hard to the left of the lone slip.
ouch, Utseya at point is hit on the thigh as the ball bounces up from an uneven patch.
Shakib gets the single away this time.
short of a length outdside off, Hom guides it to point.
fuller length and coming in sharply, Hom manages to keep it out after leaning forward and across.
yorker tails in well away from leg stump and hits the boot as Hom backs away. Leg bye taken to fine-leg.
short. Wide. Hammered through point. Zimbabwe are going down in a hurry today.
fuller length, gets him to drive to cover.
full again, Hom plays it back to the bowler.
tossed up wide of off stump, Hom square drives for another boundary. Easy as they come.
turning in from a length from outside off, Hom defends carefully.
Shakib flays a full ball through the covers with the devilish cathartic glee of a team that has been losing everything on this tour so far. The roles are being reversed today.
slower ball, Shakib is early in the drive and finds cover point.
back of a length, Shakib hangs beside the line and taps to the off side.
slow offcutter on middle and leg, Shakib defends after pressing forward.
back of a length on middle and leg, Shakib is early in turning it over to the leg side and gets an edge to the off side.
Shakib pushes the last ball into the covers for a single.
fired in outside off, Hom is good enough to carve it away through backward point for four more.
slower and tossed up, Hom plays it back to the bowler.
ah, a wicket out of nowhere? Not quite. Shakib escapes a run out chance. Hom nudged it to midwicket, the fielder swooped in and under-armed it to the keeper. A direct hit was required.
Shakib works a single to the leg side.
and now Hom pushes from the crease to the leg side.
Shakib flays another boundary through point. Only seven more to win.
that Mpofu bouncer again. The ball becomes a blimp as it soars past, well over the batsman.
attacking line, Shakib drives to mid-on off the middle and leg line.
slower ball on off stump, Shakib dabs it straight to point.
offcutter on leg stump, Shakib turns it away through square leg for one.
back of a length outside off to end the over, Hom stands tall and punches it into the covers.
tossed up on middle and leg, Shakib defends from the crease.
short of a length, cut away towards point and they get a single.
breaking in from outside off, Hom plays it to the leg side.
again, a touch of spin for Waller from outside off. Hom defends.
Scores are level. Short and wide outside off, Home cracks the cut without a fuss and it speeds away.
Home defends a flighted ball back down the track.
back of a length on the pads, Shakib works it away to the leg side but can't get the single.
on the pads again, glanced straight to short fine leg.
back of a length outside off, defended into the off side.
that's the winning runs! Shakib guides a pull shot through backward square leg. If you're a Bangladesh fan, indulge yourself in the catharsis of the moment.
